entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Natively supporting System.Dynamic.IDynamicMetaObjectProvider in Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Scripting APIs #61445
  • API Additions for Required Members #61444
    C# 11.0

Closed

  • "Make method async" refactoring adds "Async" prefix to ASP.NET Controller methods - making the name invalid #61364
    Backlog
  • Assertion failed in AbstractMergeNestedIfStatementsCodeRefactoringProvider #56101
    Backlog

PullRequests

Merged

  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #61443
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #61449
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #61448
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/required-members #61447
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • EnC: Allow adding/removing await expressions and yield statements #61356
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow creating SourceText from a StringBuilder #61251
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • [semi-auto-props]: Rename ContainsFieldKeyword, revise cases that should handle FieldKeywordBackingField #61310
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • IDE Support for Required Members #61440
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers
  • Bind native integers in cref #61431
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow source link, embedded or decompiled source in Peek Definition #61427
    Area-IDE
  • Lifted relational operator implies operands non-null when true #61403
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types
  • Support 'scoped' modifier for parameters and locals #61389
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
